statements: DELETE FROM pledges WHERE user_id = 'be5d4a0f-ffaa-4886-89bb-e9082d9b7e0f' AND pledge_amount = 100.00;
DELETE FROM pledges WHERE pledge_amount >= 1000 AND pledge_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM pledges WHERE user_id = 100 AND amount > 500;
DELETE FROM rewards WHERE redemption_status = true AND reward_id = 3;
DELETE FROM rewards WHERE reward_id = 2 AND fulfillment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM UserRewards WHERE user_id = 100 AND points_used > 50;
